title.rendered: Tokeny Solutions Hire Previous Banker as Part of Their Capital Markets Vision

content.rendered:
Tokeny Solutions has announced the new hire of Damien Fontanille, who will join the leading fintech as Business Development Director. Damien’s role will cover the French, British and Italian markets and he brings with him high level institutional sales experience. He has held senior positions at RBS and Natixis in London and has joined from ALLINDEX, a technology solutions provider for the index industry.

As part of their vision of digitizing capital markets, Tokeny Solutions recently announced the hire of Bastiaan Don and Damien Fontanille joins to further strengthen their position in Europe. Founded in 2017, the Luxembourg-based fintech is Europe’s leading provider of tokenization technology. They have worked with over 35 offerings across real estate, debt, equity, funds and utility and welcomed Euronext as their strategic investor last summer. Their success has been recognised with awards from the likes of KPMG, FinTech 50 and most recently Sifted, a list of top European fintechs backed by the Financial Times.

Having worked in a number of roles in investment banking it became clear to me that the digitization of the industry is a requirement to maintain profitability and meet client expectations. I’m delighted to join a company at the forefront of digital innovation and one that is able to bring these financial markets into the digital era.
Damien FontanilleBusiness Development Director at Tokeny Solutions

The French and British markets have been proven to be very proactive in the space and regulators have given clear guidance for industry actors. In France, a regulated sandbox was recently proposed to the EU by the AMF, with the specific goal of developing the security token sector. Last year, in the UK, the FCA gave clear guidance on security tokens and said they will be regulated in the exact same way securities are.

As part of our vision of digitizing capital markets, we need to have the personnel onboard that know these markets inside and out. Our team already consists of many individuals from the financial services industry and Damien, with his senior experience in some of the largest financial institutions in the UK and France, adds genuine strength to our team and specifically these markets.
Luc FalempinCEO of Tokeny Solutions
About Tokeny Solutions

Tokeny Solutions enables mid-cap companies, marketplaces, investment banks, funds, asset managers and distributors to dematerialize assets on the blockchain, allowing them to reach a global audience, enforce compliance obligations, enable automation and increase operational efficiency.

The Luxembourg-based FinTech company is the market-leader in delivering an institutional grade, modular end-to-end platform, allowing for the issuance, transfer and servicing management of tradable digital assets/security tokens, such as tokenized loans, structured notes, equity and funds. Tokeny has issued multiple tokenized offerings across five continents with further security offerings imminent.
